name: Battlegrowth
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

editions.flavor: "I would gladly die for the forest, but I'm much better at killing for it."

name: Battle Hurda
text: First strike

editions.flavor:
"Murasan hurdas were too aggressive to tolerate a harness, so we put them on guard duty. Now the bandits can't get within spitting distance of us."
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Battle Hymn
text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each creature you control.

editions.flavor:
"A church is just wood and walls. A congregation is the faithful praising the angels."
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

name: Battle-Mad Ronin
text:
Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
Battle-Mad Ronin attacks each turn if able.

editions.flavor: "I fought fiercely, bravely, and without mercy. Had I not struck down my captain in the heat of battle, I might have become a hero instead of an outcast."

name: Battle Mastery
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

editions.flavor:
"Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"
—Clachan Tales

"Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"
—Clachan Tales

"There is elegance in all the Ojutai do—even their killing."
—Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

"Boom Boom Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills"
—Clachan Tales

name: Battle of Wits
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

editions.flavor: The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.
There is no loftier ambition than the pursuit of knowledge.
The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.

name: Battle Rampart
text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."
—Yannash, outpost builder

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.
The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Battle Screech
text:
Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Battle Sliver
text: Sliver creatures you control get +2/+0.

editions.flavor:
"One emitted a strange series of buzzing clicks and guttural commands, then clawed arms emerged from all of them. Is there no limit to their adaptations?"
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Battle Squadron
text:
Flying
Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

editions.flavor: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.
The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.

name: Battle Strain
text: Whenever a creature blocks, Battle Strain deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

editions.flavor: The pits swallow the weak as predators swallow prey.

name: Battletide Alchemist
text: If a source would deal damage to a player, you may prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of Clerics you control.

editions.flavor: "I do not heal. Healing means that the pain has already been felt. To stop suffering, one must prevent the world's wounds altogether."

name: Battlewand Oak
text:
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Battlewise Aven
text:
Flying
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

editions.flavor: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.

name: Battlewise Hoplite
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlewise Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Battlewise Hoplite, then scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Battlewise Valor
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

editions.flavor: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.

name: Batwing Brume
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn if {W} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. Each player loses 1 life for each attacking creature he or she controls if {B} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. (Do both if {W}{B} was spent.)

name: Bay Falcon
text: Flying, vigilance

editions.flavor:
"Wear the falcon's feathers in your hair—
be fast as the falcon, bright as the Sun."
—"Rise on Wings," Zhalfirin song

name: Bayou
text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.)

name: Bayou Dragonfly
text: Flying; swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

editions.flavor:
"Like a sugar stick with wings!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Bazaar Krovod
text: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

editions.flavor: The Hauler's Collective wields great influence over the Ravnican merchant class. Without it, little moves in the city.

name: Bazaar of Baghdad
text: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

name: Bazaar of Wonders
text:
When Bazaar of Wonders enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it if a card with the same name is in a graveyard or a nontoken permanent with the same name is on the battlefield.

name: Bazaar Trader
text: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.

editions.flavor: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."

name: Beacon Behemoth
text: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.

editions.flavor: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

name: Beacon Hawk
text:
Flying
Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature.
{W}: Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Beacon of Creation
text: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each Forest you control. Shuffle Beacon of Creation into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: A chorus of life heralds the arrival of Mirrodin's final sun.

name: Beacon of Destiny
text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.

editions.flavor: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

name: Beacon of Destruction
text: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.
The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.
The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

name: Beacon of Immortality
text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.
The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

name: Beacon of Tomorrows
text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.
To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

name: Beacon of Unrest
text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

editions.flavor: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.
"The light of my master's guidance traverses all boundaries, even those separating life and death."
A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.
A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.
A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.
—Elvish saying

name: Bearer of Overwhelming Truths
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Bearer of Overwhelming Truths deals combat damage to a player, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Bearer of Silence
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When you cast Bearer of Silence, you may pay {1}{C}. If you do, target opponent sacrifices a creature. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
Flying
Bearer of Silence can't block.

name: Bearer of the Heavens
text: When Bearer of the Heavens dies, destroy all permanents at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.flavor: To hold the heavens from the earth is no curse, but a titanic responsibility.

name: Bearscape
text: {1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

editions.flavor:
"Nature is the endless dance between life and death."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Bear's Companion
text: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Bear creature token.

editions.flavor: "The Sultai came hunting for a bear hide. Now I have a belt of naga skin, and my friend has a full belly."

name: Bear Umbra
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

text:
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

text:
Haste

editions.flavor: "They come because I call. They stay because I listen."
"They come because I call. They stay because I listen."

name: Beast Hunt
text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Beastmaster Ascension
text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension.
As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

name: Beastmaster's Magemark
text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
Whenever a creature you control that's enchanted becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

name: Beast of Burden
text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: Though it was built as an instrument of labor, it wasn't long before it became an instrument of war.
"If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"
The heavier the load, the harder it works.

The heavier the load, the harder it works.

name: Beasts of Bogardan
text:
Protection from red
Beasts of Bogardan gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken white permanent.

editions.flavor: Bogardan is a land as volatile as the creatures who live there.
Bogardan is a land as volatile as the creatures who live there.

name: Beast Walkers
text: {G}: Beast Walkers gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

editions.flavor:
"The Beast Walkers do a great service to Aysen. As humans or as beasts, their heart is yet to Serra true."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Beast Within
text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

editions.flavor:
"Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."

When a graveyard is full, the gwyllions rattle the tombs and unleash the spirits into the sky.

name: Become Immense
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

name: Bedlam
text: Creatures can't block.

editions.flavor: Sometimes quantity, in the absence of quality, is good enough.
The generals were dead. The battle plans were forgotten. It was everyone for themselves.

name: Bedlam Reveler
text:
Bedlam Reveler costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

name: Bee Sting
text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.
—Alaborn saying

—Alaborn saying

name: Beetleback Chief
text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

text: {G}{U}: Beetleform Mage gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor:
"When the Simic say to take command of your life, we don't mean just your career."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Befoul
text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor:
"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
—Radiant, archangel
The bog's touch means death to all but the darkest of hearts.

"When the rampaging kami at Reito had crushed the opposing militia, swarms of minor kami swept over the battlefield to consume all that remained."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

name: Beguiler of Wills
text: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.

editions.flavor: "Come, let me free you of the tyranny of thought."

name: Behemoth's Herald
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a red creature, a green creature, and a white creature: Search your library for a card named Godsire and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: "Mine is an insatiable god, with appetites as magnificent as the jungle itself."

name: Behemoth Sledge
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample.
Equip {3}

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor:
"May this grant you all the strength of the behemoths and none of their serenity."
—Ajani
Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

name: Behind the Scenes
text:
Creatures you control have skulk. (They can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: It does no good to bar the gate when the enemy is already inside.

name: Behold the Beyond
text: Discard your hand. Search your library for three cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: There is power in the abyss, in blackness more profound than the darkest dreams.

name: Behold the Power of Destruction
text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.

editions.flavor: "I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!"

name: Belbe's Armor
text: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.

editions.flavor: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

name: Belbe's Percher
text:
Flying
Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.

editions.flavor: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

name: Belbe's Portal
text:
As Belbe's Portal enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

name: Belfry Spirit
text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

text:
First strike
Belligerent Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it.

Whenever you cast a white spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Belligerent Hatchling.

name: Belligerent Sliver
text: Sliver creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

editions.flavor:
"The slivers became adept at provoking a fear response in other species."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Whiptails can sense a traveler's footsteps from a great distance. Measuring that distance has been . . . difficult."—Jalun, Affa sentry

text:
Flying

text: Raid — When Bellowing Saddlebrute enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

text:

text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

text:
Flying, hexproof

name: Belltower Sphinx
text:
Flying

name: Beloved Chaplain
text: Protection from creatures

editions.flavor: Nomad and Nantuko, eagle and elephant; all the birds and beasts are charmed by his quiet dignity.

name: Benalish Cavalry
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

editions.flavor: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."

editions.flavor:
"These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself—right now!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

name: Benalish Veteran
text: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "One day I will rest and join my comrades in the afterlife, but not while scum like you still sully this world."

name: Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit
text: {T}: Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of untapped Mountains you control.

editions.flavor: Some akki thought of Ben-Ben as a kami of trickery in disguise. They hunted for him in the maze of warrens, often falling prey to his traps.

name: Bend or Break
text: Each player separates all nontoken lands he or she controls into two piles. For each player, one of his or her piles is chosen by one of his or her opponents of his or her choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

name: Benediction of Moons
text:
You gain 1 life for each player.
Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.)
When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

name: Benefaction of Rhonas
text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or an enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

editions.flavor: It falls to the gods to help all become worthy of the afterlife.

name: Benefactor's Draught
text:
Untap all creatures. Until end of turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls blocks, draw a card.
Draw a card.

name: Benevolent Ancestor
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

editions.flavor: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

editions.flavor: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."
"My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

name: Benevolent Offering
text:
Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature he or she controls.

name: Benevolent Unicorn
text: If a spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature or player instead.

editions.flavor:
The best use for a unicorn's horn is to adorn a unicorn.
—Femeref adage
